home-banner-description-1.zh-cn: ElephantBI是企业大数据管理分析和商业智能平台
home-banner-description-1.zh-tw: ElephantBI是企業大數據管理分析和商業智能平台
home-banner-description-1.en-US: ElephantBI delivers big data management and analysis technology to enterprises. Pull from everywhere, integrate everything, connect everyone. Update data automatically, so you can track time-sensitive trends and see business performance in real time

home-banner-description-2.zh-cn: 实时连接聚合企业所有数据，简单灵活的交互式可视化数据分析
home-banner-description-2.zh-tw: 實時連接聚合企業所有數據，簡單靈活的交互式可視化數據分析

home-banner-description-3.zh-cn: 先进的敏捷BI模式，深入挖掘大数据价值，更快获得全局洞察，精准制定数据支持的商业决策
home-banner-description-3.zh-tw: 先進的敏捷BI模式，深入挖掘大數據價值，更快獲得全局洞察，精準制定數據支持的商業決策

big-data-storage-description-1.zh-cn: 数据库一键连接，支持MySQL、PostgreSQL、Microsoft SQL、Oracle等
big-data-storage-description-1.zh-tw: 資料庫一鍵連接，支持MySQL、PostgreSQL、Microsoft SQL、Oracle等
big-data-storage-description-1.en-US: Import data from databases , including MySQL, PostgreSQL, Microsoft SQL, Oracle, etc.

big-data-storage-description-2.zh-cn: 云端服务器数据、内部服务器数据，均可集中管理
big-data-storage-description-2.zh-tw: 雲端伺服器數據、內部伺服器數據，均可集中管理
big-data-storage-description-2.en-US: Connect data in cloud services and data in on-premise system

big-data-storage-description-3.zh-cn: 本地Excel/Csv文件数据可轻松上传、更新、追加
big-data-storage-description-3.zh-tw: 本地Excel/Csv文件數據可輕鬆上傳、更新、追加
big-data-storage-description-3.en-US: Data in local Excel/Csv file can also be easily uploaded, updated and appended

big-data-storage-description-4.zh-cn: 无需技术支持，业务人员更方便的查看、筛选、导出数据
big-data-storage-description-4.zh-tw: 無需技術支持，業務人員更方便的查看、篩選、匯出數據
big-data-storage-description-4.en-US: Business staffs can manage and analysis data independently without technical support

big-data-storage-description-5.zh-cn: 强大的数据管理功能，更可设定数据库数据同步方式及周期等
big-data-storage-description-5.zh-tw: 強大的數據管理功能，更可設定資料庫數據同步方式及週期等
big-data-storage-description-5.en-US: Support users to set the data synchronization mode and timing

visualized-data-analysis-description-1.zh-cn: 简单拖拽，数据图表瞬间生成
visualized-data-analysis-description-1.zh-tw: 簡單拖拽，數據圖表瞬間生成
visualized-data-analysis-description-1.en-US: Create charts by visualized dragging and dropping

visualized-data-analysis-description-2.zh-cn: 图表类型丰富，几十种随意挑选
visualized-data-analysis-description-2.zh-tw: 圖表類型豐富，幾十種隨意挑選

visualized-data-analysis-description-3.zh-cn: 自由布局，图文混排，数据动向清晰明了
visualized-data-analysis-description-3.zh-tw: 自由佈局，圖文混排，數據動向清晰明了
visualized-data-analysis-description-3.en-US: Decision makers can easily gain deeper insight into the data

visualized-data-analysis-description-4.zh-cn: 图表联动，数据不再静止，让数据说话
visualized-data-analysis-description-4.zh-tw: 圖表聯動，數據不再靜止，讓數據說話
visualized-data-analysis-description-4.en-US: Interactive charts and dashboards make actionable data stories possible

team-cooperation-description-1.zh-cn: 多种类，多终端的交互式图表和仪表盘，帮助决策者从容讲述数据背后的线索
team-cooperation-description-1.zh-tw: 多種類，多終端的交互式圖表和儀錶盤，幫助決策者從容講述數據背後的線索
team-cooperation-description-1.en-US: Bridge the gap between data and people

team-cooperation-description-2.zh-cn: 深度集成即时沟通工具，帮助全员围绕商业数据分享协作，让数据驱动沟通融入日常工作的方方面面
team-cooperation-description-2.zh-tw: 深度集成即時溝通工具，幫助全員圍繞商業數據分享協作，讓數據驅動溝通融入日常工作的方方面面
team-cooperation-description-2.en-US: Enables all employees to engage with real-time data, increasing everyone's productivity

team-cooperation-description-3.zh-cn: 以数据连接全体成员，打破团队成员间的信息隔阂。帮助团队时刻了解业务关键指标，保持清晰的业务共识
team-cooperation-description-3.zh-tw: 以數據連接全體成員，打破團隊成員間的資訊隔閡，幫助團隊時刻了解業務關鍵指標，保持清晰的業務共識
team-cooperation-description-3.en-US: Allows everyone to share and collaborate around business data as a natural part of the discussion

privilege-management-description-1.zh-cn: 灵活严谨的用户和角色体系，快速准确的赋予数据权限，兼具效率与安全
privilege-management-description-1.zh-tw: 靈活嚴謹的用戶和角色體系，快速準確的賦予數據權限，兼具效率與安全
privilege-management-description-1.en-US: Give users the right access to only the right Data

privilege-management-description-2.zh-cn: 提供行列粒度的数据权限控制，确保每一行每一列数据的访问都尽在控制
privilege-management-description-2.zh-tw: 提供行列粒度的數據權限控制，確保每一行每一列數據的訪問都盡在控制
privilege-management-description-2.en-US: ElephantBI security offers comprehensive controls to help you easily provide effective oversight, from the big picture to the smallest detail

select-demo.zh-cn: 请选择下方要体验的行业Demo
select-demo.zh-tw: 請選擇下方要體驗的行業Demo

internet-demo-description.zh-cn: 实时跟踪访客数，流量走势，竞争对手策略趋势等关键业务指标，掌握最新产品动向，辅助决策和调整产品方向
internet-demo-description.zh-tw: 實時追蹤訪客數，流量走勢，競爭對手策略趨勢等關鍵業務指標，掌握最新產品動向，輔助決策和調整產品方向
internet-demo-description.en-US: Through analytics, software owners can monitor the user activities on their software and truly understand customer behaviors, which will drive business decisions.

retail-demo-description.zh-cn: 从精细化管理的角度，利用数据分析，帮助零售企业给出数据解决方案，提高零售转化率同时降低退货率
retail-demo-description.zh-tw: 從精細化管理的角度，利用數據分析，幫助零售企業給出數據解決方案，提高零售轉換率同時降低退貨率
retail-demo-description.en-US: Mash up large volumes of data or a variety of data sources to improve promotions, marketing, and your customer's experience.

enterprise-service-demo-description.zh-cn: 了解客户差异化需求，提供更专业的服务，降低获客成本，提高客户活跃度和留存度，增加客户黏性，提高续约率
enterprise-service-demo-description.zh-tw: 了解客戶差異化需求，提供更專業的服務，降低獲客成本，提高客戶活躍度和留存度，增加客戶粘性，提高續約率
enterprise-service-demo-description.en-US: Provide more professional services to customer according to their needs, it will help reducing customer acquisition costs and increasing renewal rate.

entertainment-demo-description.zh-cn: 时刻保持最新状态，对即将发生的事件进行趋势预测，让数据变得可靠实用，数据指导精准营销活动
entertainment-demo-description.zh-tw: 時刻保持最新狀態，對即將發生的事件進行趨勢預測，讓數據變得可靠實用，數據指導精準營銷活動
entertainment-demo-description.en-US: To truly keep up to date, capitalize on the new digital marketplace and connected consumer, leaders require accessible, real-time and reliable data.

education-demo-description.zh-cn: 从重复琐碎工作中解放大脑，指导根据创新的教学方法，提供用户分组、漏斗分析等，跟踪学生动态，提出具有针对性的提升方案
education-demo-description.zh-tw: 從重複瑣粹工作中解放大腦，指導根據創新的教學方法，提供用戶分組、漏斗分析等，追蹤學生動態，提出具有針對性的提示方案
education-demo-description.en-US: Education institutions have the challenge of successfully attracting and trtaining students, ElephantBI helps to monitor marketing and student acquisition, identify and track at-risk students.

financial-demo-description.zh-cn: 以精细化运营的姿态面对行业变化，依靠数据为客户提供精准保险服务，降低获客成本，提高用户留存和增购
financial-demo-description.zh-tw: 以精細化運營的姿態面對行業變化，依靠數據為客戶提供精準保險服務，降低獲客成本，提高用戶留存和增購
financial-demo-description.en-US: ElephantBI helps financial service experts to understand business better and see what's coming as a single platform that's easy to use, share and pull in all your data in real-time.

manufacture-demo-description.zh-cn: 整合多业务系统和大型ERP数据互通，合理分配资源降低生产成本，优化生产线管理提升产品质量
manufacture-demo-description.zh-tw: 整合多業務系統和大型ERP數據互通，合理分配資源降低生產成本，優化生產線管理提高產品質量
manufacture-demo-description.en-US: Real-time, data analysis will help to detect demand trends early, optimize pricing strategies, give manufacturers a competitive advantage in the manufacturing industry.

e-commerce-demo-description.zh-cn: 多业务系统的数据整合，打破信息孤岛，高效的客户管理及供应商合作管理，差异化线上和线下运营，帮助电商客户科学决策
e-commerce-demo-description.zh-tw: 多業務系統的數據整合，打破資訊孤島，高效的客戶管理及供應商合作管理，差異化線上和線下運營，幫助電商客戶科學決策
e-commerce-demo-description.en-US: Understand where your buyers come from, what's important to them, why they're converting, get real-time spend and ROI by tracking everything in one place.

catering-demo-description.zh-cn: 实现繁杂数据整合，提高顾客就餐率，及时调整营销策略，提供数据驱动的解决方案，轻松提高客户的满意度
catering-demo-description.zh-tw: 實現繁雜數據整合，提高顧客就餐率，及時調整營銷策略，提供數據驅動的解決方案，輕鬆提高客戶的滿意度
catering-demo-description.en-US: Improve customer dining rate, adjust marketing strategy in time, improve customer's degree of satisfaction by integrating all data together and monitoring the changing trend of data.

logistics-demo-description.zh-cn: 轻松了解追踪客户行为，打通业务系统，科学调度车辆，提高订单完成率、准时率，提高物流效率，保证客户满意度
logistics-demo-description.zh-tw: 輕鬆了解追蹤客戶行為，打通業務系統，科學調度車輛，提高訂單完成率、準時率，提高物流效率，保證客戶滿意度
logistics-demo-description.en-US: You can find trends in profitable customer acquisition, track systems for better efficiency and volume. ElephantBI will give you instant insights and grow your business.

other-demo-description.zh-cn: 旅游业，保险业，农产品，电气化工，高新科技，生活服务等更多行业，联系我们，专业行业顾问将为您定制行业方案
other-demo-description.zh-tw: 旅遊業，保險業，農產品，電氣化工，高新科技，生活服務等更多行業，聯系我們，專業行業顧問將為您定制行業方案
other-demo-description.en-US: If you are in tourist, insurance, agricultural, electrical and chemistry, high tech, services or others, contact us for a free project consultation!

home-bottom-banner-title.zh-cn: 数据驱动，精准决策，即刻启程
home-bottom-banner-title.zh-tw: 數據驅動，精準決策，即刻啟程
home-bottom-banner-title.en-US: Data Driven, Precise Decision Making. Start Now!

home-bottom-banner-description.zh-cn: ElephantBI专注数据价值，让数据真正服务于工作，现在开始免费试用
home-bottom-banner-description.zh-tw: ElephantBI專注數據價值，讓數據真正服務于工作，現在開始免費試用
home-bottom-banner-description.en-US: ElephantBI focuses on the value of data, making data truly work. Now start your free 14-day trial!
